  • Method Details

    • okToIllustrate

      public boolean okToIllustrate(ActionOptions actionOptions, ObjectCollection... objectCollections)
      We might not want to illustrate an action every time it repeats, particularly for Find operations. If the action is a Find and the previous action was also a Find, and the Collections are the same, it is a repeated action. Repeated actions are not illustrated if BrobotSettings.drawRepeatedActions is set to false (the default setting).
      Parameters:
      actionOptions - holds the action configuration.
      objectCollections - are the objects acted on.
      Returns:
      true if illustration is allowed.

    • illustrateWhenAllowed

      public boolean illustrateWhenAllowed(Matches matches, List<Region> searchRegions, ActionOptions actionOptions, ObjectCollection... objectCollections)
